website_summaries.verdict: This cleanser keeps any man’s face soft and hydrated while smoothing his complexion. It’s sold in an 8-ounce bottle.
pros: This creamy, three-in-one lotion cleanser leaves skin feeling both clean and moisturized
Gently removes dead skin cells to prevent razor burn and ingrown hairs
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the milky consistency

customer_reviews.title: Made me breakout
customer_reviews.text: Breakout city. I had received a trial size of this product and loved it. I have no idea what the difference was between the trial size and the full size, perhaps the trial had a higher concentration of charcoal. However, I bought the full size and instantly broke out after one wash. This did not happen during the trial size bottle. As other reviewers have noted this stuff is also super watery and half of what you pour out will run through your fingers and down the drain so even though the bottle comes in a decent size, most of it will never end up on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: A Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order of the Charcoal Face Wash. The 1st time it came with the Men's Daily Advanced Face Care Routine II.This is one of the first few items I tried from Brickell. It is one of the best facial wash that I've tried. I have used this in combination with the facial scrub. I have achieved the results I have been looking for, my wife even notices the difference in my skin. As with their other products, a little goes a long way. One bottle will last about almost 4 months pending on how much is used.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: ... wash was the third Brickell product I've tried after good success with the face scrub and moisturizer I am ...
customer_reviews.text: This charcoal face wash was the third Brickell product I've tried after good success with the face scrub and moisturizer I am at risk of becoming a brand ambassador for Brickell. After using this product in conjunction with the scrub and moisturizer as part of my daily routine, I am actually getting comments about my skin from my wife and family. I'm not really the type of guy who ever cared about this stuff, but I understand now that a little work goes a long way, with the right product. Brickell makes the right product.
customer_reviews.author: MJLogan42

customer_reviews.title: Has combated my oil and red rashed face!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every morning and it simply does the job so many other products claim to do. This so far is the only product that has eliminated my dry, flaky, oily, and red rash skin on my face. It leaves my skin feeling clean and clear. Since using this product , it has also helped me shave by clearing up blemishes, which has led me to buy the brushless shaving cream by Brickell as well; another great product. This has become a trusted brand and I will enjoy any future purchases from this company. I highly reccomend this product if you are having trouble with skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product. I was very surprised by the small amount (nickel size) required to do a fantastic job cleaning my face. You can tell its working as you wash your face. It almost seems as if it is grabbing deep down in your face cleaning out your pores. And, if that doesn't convince you be sure to use a white clothe. You'll see everything it extricated off your face. I wish I had got this the first time I ran across it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: T. Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Ok face wash, kinda smells like unsweetened tea
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to give this stuff a try as I have been switching to all organic soaps, lotions, etc. I got their shampoo and it’s great! However I’m not a big fan of this face wash. The scent is ok - kinda reminds me of unsweetened tea of all things. Consistency is very thin/runny. I put a dab in my hand the size of a quarter and it’s barely enough to cover my entire face. Almost zero lather. I don’t expect an organic product to look, smell, and act like a non-organic product. For the price of this stuff I expected something better than what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Shane D.

customer_reviews.title: This just works.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this face wash now for about 2 years (switched from the Rugged & Dapper product). Bottom line: this stuff works, esp when you have to deal with NYC grime clogging up your pores every day. I use it in the shower once a day. Each bottle lasts me about 4 months.Like the product so much I have started looking at their other offerings (and that’s a big ask from a “don’t have any kind of routine” guy)
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Seems to slow down my breakouts.
customer_reviews.text: I starting using this product and my breakouts have slowed down. I still get them but not as bad as before. This is the best product I've used that doesn't dry out my skin like the others I've tried. I follow this up with a moisturizer and has been working well. I love the natural ingredients in this as well. The only negative is the cost. It is on the high side but you don't really need alot is the good thing. I use a quarter size when washing my face so it should last a few months. I will for sure buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Russ_C

customer_reviews.title: No Over-Drying - Helps Acne
customer_reviews.text: My issue with most face wash/scrubs has always been over-drying, leading to flaky irritated skin. This charcoal wash doesn't lather into a typical soap, which is key. The wash still removes the excess oil/dirt from your skin, but doesn't strip it. I'm on my 3rd bottle and now able to wash my face morning and night without any over-drying issues. It hasn't cured my adult acne, but has made a huge difference without adding irritation from washing. Highly recommend giving this a shot
customer_reviews.author: ChiTown

customer_reviews.title: Your face will feel and smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product will change your life! I have a long beard. I’m a James harden fan hoping he signs with the lakers and keep the beard long like him. For some reason I always grow these red patches under my beard that burn and itch very painful, almost got rid of the beard. But after buying this product not only did they patches didn’t come back but it leaves my face feeling the healthiest it has ever felt! It minimises my pores as well hydrated my face the way I never knew it can. Only negative things about this product is that it will soon run out and I will need more . I hope you buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy franco

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing feel - will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Another product from Brickell that somehow feels natural and actually works. I have fairly good skin, but still tend to get a couple pimples/zits about once a month. I've been using this product two months and have not had any breakouts, dry skin or any other adverse effect. After using this facial cleanser, my skin feels clean and there's also a cool, refreshing feeling immediately after rinsing it off. One complaint is that it's more watery than usual facial cleansers so it comes out faster, but with the bottle design this really hasn't been an issue. I plan on sticking with this facial cleanser. It gets the job done without making me feel like I'm slathering my face in chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giesy

customer_reviews.title: Use it morning and night
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first bottle of Brickell Men's Purifying Charcoal Face Wash and couldn't be happier with it's performance and value. Besides morning and night, I find myself using at after working out and after working outside, too. Whether it's grime, sweat, bug spray or sun lotion, the face wash does an excellent job making my face feel clean and it does not dry my skin out at all. It seems to last a long while, since a little goes a long way. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck D

customer_reviews.title: Will only use this face wash from now on
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product—thrilled to review this. Tried dozens of products before and they never work near like this. Yeah it’s not a cheap gel—you have to use a dime size amount and rub it gently on your face. Reduced pore size, people even commented how great my skin looked, and I never knew how much it could be improved until I tried this product. Just try it—great company and will work with you if you don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cheadl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product That Doesn't Irritate Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skincare product for men. I have struggled with sensitive skin and acne my entire adult life. I performed some research and the Brickell products were consistently being mentioned as a top skincare product for men. I have been using this product and a few others from Brickell for about a month now and I have noticed a considerable difference. I have had drastically fewer breakouts and my skin looks less irritated (typically anti-acne products contain harsh ingredients). I would highly recommend to anyone experimenting with a new skincare regiment. The only downside is price, but I would gladly a higher price for a quality product. Brickell's facial moisturizer is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash I have ever used

customer_reviews.author: Aria Y.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t see any change
customer_reviews.text: It does smell nice. I’ve been using it for a couple weeks and I gradually have used a little more each wash. I know it says a quarter sized amount, but sometimes I just pour a little extra for more potency. I don’t think it makes any difference. But in my honest opinion, I haven’t seen any change. Maybe I’m already following as healthy a lifestyle as I can be and taking in all the vitamins and nutrients in my diet and supplements. Idk. Maybe the other reviews are from guys who have crappy diets, sleep little and never exercise. All I know is, for me it was a waste of money and no one beats Father Time.
customer_reviews.author: dwayne c.

I look forward to trying more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

My girlfriend frequently comments on how improved my skin has become and has started using this product herself.

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Wash

customer_reviews.title: Best and last face wash you will ever need!!

This gives your skin the essential oils and ingredients it needs to look great and be protected. The name brand “same old” washes will strip it of the oils it needs hence leave it open for breakouts. This is the most all inclusive wash ever and you need to just take a chance you won’t regret it.

customer_reviews.author: Fult

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients

It seems to clean my face, no irritations, and a nice smell that isn't too strong. I pair with the moisturizer and face scrub which both work great as well. This is a little more expensive than other options, but it's nice to use natural ingredients which was what I was looking for in a face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I use this charcoal facewash daily on dry/ oily skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this charcoal facewash daily on dry/ oily skin. I really appreciate how it cleans my face without drying or leaving behind any residue and doesn't have any funky smells. When used in conjunction with other products (like Brickell's anti aging cream), it really shines.
customer_reviews.author: Nompton

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive, a little disappointing

It seems to clean my face okay, perhaps I was expecting a little too much out of it. It has a nice and pleasant scent, but it seems very runny/watery. It doesn't really lather up at all, to my dismay. I don't think I'll be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: After a lifetime of blackheads and intermittent acne I recently had an outbreak that I could not get rid. I tried ever over the counter product available, and it just seemed to make my skin worse. After only a few washes with Brickell Charcoal Face Wash I could feel the difference. It didn't fight the acne, but it gave me truly health skin. In turn the acne became non-existent, and the blackheads shrank. The non foaming wash feels different from most face washes while scrubbing, but washes clean away quickly leaving your skin refreshed. The scent is also very nice as well. I recommend this face wash to everybody, whether you have problematic skin or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K

customer_reviews.title: Actual noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I began using this product months ago in the hope I could battle some under the eye aging. I do use it as part of a regimen with lotions from the same brand, and a noticeable difference began after a few weeks. The product isn't super cheap, but it also lasted quite awhile, so I still feel its worth it. I have NOT previously been the kind of person to invest in this kind of product or lotions, but passing 40 changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: joel fleet

customer_reviews.title: Keeps oily skin a bay

They make another Cleansing Face Wash for oily skin and I enjoyed the sample from the sampler pack, but did not notice a difference between the two in performance. Sticker shock can be an issue, but it works well and is used sparingly so I feel it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mark_CA

customer_reviews.title: Improvement over most charcoal face washes
customer_reviews.text: Great charcoal face wash. I have tried a couple different brands offering a similar product and found them a bit rough when used outside of the shower. This stuff is a little thinner (in a good way) and leaves my face feeling refreshed, while seemingly keeping blackheads at bay. Using this every night, in addition to Brickell's face scrub a couple times a week, has certainly helped with the oily skin I tend to get around my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market for sure

These are amazing products for men and I highly recommend trying this brand. Give the sample kit a test run and after that Its guaranteed you will buy more.

I've used other face washes, but this is the one I continue to come back to.

customer_reviews.title: new favorite face wash

Not sure what the scent actually is as it doesnt say, but to me, I get a fresh peeled orange kinda scent . If you are interested in what Brickell has to offer, I highly recommend the Sample kit. customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a good charcoal face wash? Look no further.

It's best used in conjunction with the face scrub and the daily moisturizer. The face scrub isnt mandatory, but definitely helps if you use it every other day. The moisturizer is almost a necessity, if I use the daily scrub and not the moisturizer then my skin tends to overproduce oil. Don't think that using this alone is going to solve your problems. It's not very harsh, it smells good, Ill be using this for the foreseeable future. 9/10

customer_reviews.title: Switching to Brickell!
customer_reviews.text: Figured I would give this a try since I've used the regular face wash before. I like it! It doesnt foam up or anything which isn't an issue. From what I read, that's better it doesn't. I'm definitely going to try out more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kalb

I had been using another competition's scrub and wash 2-in-1 product, but I think I will be changing to these permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cuestas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for men who care about their skin

The Brickell Charcoal Face Wash thoroughly cleans off all of the dirt and oil. It also does not dry my skin out like many of the products I have used in the past. Definitely recommend it to anyone with sensitive skin who is looking for a natural face wash.

customer_reviews.text: After the amazing results I experienced with the Brickell Facial moisturizer it just made sense to give their other products a try. I have sensitive skin that does not like to be too oily or too dry. I found the Brickell face wash with charcoal to be the perfect balance. My face feels clean and refreshed without being dry or oily. Any acne that was giving me a problem is now non-existent. This is a great face cleanser that I would receive recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Richmond VA

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a charcoal wash to reduce oil, but I didn't want something that dried my skin. With Aloe as a primary ingredient, this keeps my face soft and oil free at the same time. It's also done a great job of reducing/eliminating the occasional blemish. One negative is the frangrance. I realize it's natural, but it smells kinda like natural bug spray mixed with your grandfather's after shave. The good news is that the scent doesn't linger after rinsing. Also, the consistency of the product isn't great, as my first bottle was medium thickness, but the second bottle seemed very thin, almost water-like. It's still a great product even with these two complaints.
customer_reviews.author: TampaBayBrowns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best everyday toner that I have tried. It has a mild cooling sensation from peppermint extract that is great for calming inflammation. It is packed with several other natural ingredients with healing properties, and reduces oil buildup. It is also less abrasive than many astringents which enables it to be used without an additional moisturizer. The spray cap also allows it to be used conservatively and without the need for cotton balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Redd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the charcoal wash for awhile now (I'm actually on my 2nd bottle). You only need a bit for a wash and it goes a long way. I use it in the morning when I'm ready to go out and at night right before bed. Unlike other face cleaners, this one actually makes my face feel clean and it doesn't feel like it just dried out my face. If anything, my face feels a bit softer after use. I'm actually a fan of the scent too, it just smells clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much water
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for only 2 weeks and it’s already empty. It’s pretty much water! As in it’s just as runny as water and always slips through my hands onto the floor and goes to waste. It does the job of cleaning my face, and doesn’t have much of a scent, which I like, but $25 for a small bottle that only lasts a short period of time, this is a deal that is definitely not worth it (for me at least)
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Unlike Any Other Charcoal Products
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy charcoal bars. You know the drill. Lather it up in your hands, rub it all over your face. While it works, the Brickell Charcoal Face Wash is not only easier, unlike the other charcoal washes I have tried, you can actually feel this product working on your skin in a subtle way, unlike the other soap-based products I've used. I dont think anyone would have any regrets using the Brickell Face Washing products.
customer_reviews.author: Goosey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stuff, Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I can tell this is a high quality product. It sure smells nice. But it does not lather at all. I cannot get used to a face wash that has no lather. I'm hoping my wife will use it up; she has other products with charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Less is more
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves your skin feeling fresh and clean. The unique texture of the charcoal is very nice and has a very masculine scent. You can tell the dirt is being washed away and it really leaves your face feeling refreshed and invigorated. I would definitely recommend this face wash to any man who is looking for something different than you can find at other retailers. A little of the product goes a long way! Next time I will buy the larger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily or dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I work in a kitchen, so I get oil and sweat on my face all the time. I also go in and out of coolers/freezers, stand in front of fire, etc. My face deals with a lot, and I struggled to find a product that helped balance everything out. So far this is the best thing I've found that keeps my face clean and acne free, while not totally drying my face out. The minty scent also helps wake me up in the morning. The price put me off at first, but a bottle lasts me almost three months. If you're hesitant, I say give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: This is part of an excellent group of products
customer_reviews.text: I've used Kiehl's for the past few years and wanted to try something else. I bought this after seeing good reviews about the company. I really liked the product. When I received it there was a deal to buy a sample pack directly from Brickell and just pay shipping. I did this and was so happy with what I bought that I purchased an additional $150+ in products. I Besides this, I really like their night and day serum, anti aging cream, and the shampoo and conditioner. Also in the sample pack was a handy sheet saying how to apply their products a feature I also really liked. I highly recommend this and other products of theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have never established a facial cleaning habit until now. I have never purchased facial products before so I was a bit timid with my purchases and I was wondering if I was just wasting my money. However the product works. I decided to purchase an exfoliating facial scrub in combination with the charcoal daily facial wash and the lotion and they work great! Even after the first week, my family noticed the difference. I have been using the product for almost a month now and I have no regrets! I am a happy customer and I especially enjoy the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Decided to make the switch to more organic products to see all of the hype. I initially went for Brickell products after reading many online reviews from various sites. This is an excellent face wash - especially if you are into charcoal based products. It has an inviting mint/tea scent. I’ve used it for about two weeks now twice a day in combination with the moisturizer and feel that my complexion is brighter! Highly recommend especially if you want to try moving away from more traditional brands and going more organic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Key hygiene product for men
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly just looking for a nice face wash for men to kinda increase my hygiene as I never cared for face washes and stumbled upon Brickell to later find out that they also offered free sample boxes with a bunch of their products on their website so I went ahead and got one and that was the end of that! Great product, great smell, feel, and honestly an essential if you really wanna hump up your hygiene game.
customer_reviews.author: Eder Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Caused ance for me
customer_reviews.text: This product made me break out. I purchased because I find their daily moisturiser great for my skin however I have found that my skin has negative reactions to many other products I have tried from this company . I know the review doesn’t mean much since every ones skin is different. You really have to try it out for yourself to know if it works.
customer_reviews.author: gene s

customer_reviews.title: OMG...Best Face Wash I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: OMG....Where do I begin. Long story short...EVERY man especially those who can appreciate a smooth clean shave should invest in this product. Clears the pores wonderfully and smooths out the skin with a nice citrusy smell. You need this type of cleanser before each shave and before you good to bed. Gives your stubble the erection in the morning it needs for a smooth shave. Also, hard to find a product this good that's made for men. I know. I've been through them all and this wash is far superior. Don't be put off by the price. Worth every penny. Seriously...this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels good man
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff because it makes my face feel nice and fresh. Like getting kissed in the entire face by a minty princess. Smells pretty freaking god awful though. But whatever it'll be fine it washes off easy and I can hold my breath like a big boy.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian m.

customer_reviews.title: Washes great, rinses cleanly
customer_reviews.text: I've been using men's facial wash and moisturizers for a few years now, and have tried a few brands (L'Oréal Men Expert, Clarins, Harry's, John Masters Organics). My preference is for a semi-foamy wash that rinses cleanly (without the slick feeling that most gel washes leave), and without a heavy scent. This wash works perfectly for those objectives. The charcoal grey liquid looks a bit weird at first, but I got used to it and it's the results that matter anyway. Great product, I plan to continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. I have been using it for a few weeks now and can definitely tell the difference from other face washes I have used. Leaves face feeling nice and clean. Was a little weird at first using the wash and not having any kind of foam but it still feels like it is doing it's job. If I had one slightly negative thing to say it would be that product is a little runny so it is easy for it to spill out or more come out than you wanted. Other than that this is a great face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrell B

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I came across this product after ordering their daily fortifying shampoo. I have been quite happy with this product, it just works, I don't know how else to say it. Skin feels clean and looks clean. As others have said it is not as thick as one would expect and rather runny, but once I knew what to expect it hasn't been a problem. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a great natural face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Total crap
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst product, I've ever bought on Amazon. I shook it a hundred times but it was a watery mess. I feel like I was robbed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius Khan

customer_reviews.title: Antibacterial/Toxin Absorbing
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great for my skin. The scent is fresh and feels like my skin “wakes up”. Charcoal is anti-bacterial and helps with cleaning pores and preventing acne, but it can also be very stripping which is why I only use it at night and another cleanser in the morning. Using it twice a day for an extended period of time (2-3 years) added to my redness, but once I reduced my use to once a day, it helped. Everyone’s skin is different, but I would recommend this product for nightly use to get rid bacteria that builds up on your face during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobe S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product did not do anything to clear pores. Have been using for a couple months as instructed with zero improvement in skin. I would not purchase this again. Also bought the face scrub at same time, no success across the board. For The price I expected some result in clearing clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: ... with top barely screwed on and bottle not sealed like their other products
customer_reviews.text: Seems decent but came in the package with top barely screwed on and bottle not sealed like their other products. Feel like half the bottle got emptied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a fail Brickell
customer_reviews.text: I have bought some great products from Brickell, but this product is a major fail. What were you thinking?? If you like liquid black charcoal all over your face, go for it! This product is not appealing at all and does not do a good job of cleaning your face. Really disappointed. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moe

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the feel of it...
customer_reviews.text: I had used the Brickhell clarifying face wash which comes in the brown bottle. I loved that product because it felt good after washing my face, the smell was also good, and overall my face felt very clean after the wash. This time I thought I would try something new and bought the purifying face wash. This product doesn't feel like a face wash. When I put the product in my hand and try to rub it, all the product falls out of my hand, there no foaming which I really don't like this product. For my next purchase, I am going back to the Clarifying face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Chaudhari

customer_reviews.title: To runny for my like
customer_reviews.text: I like this face wash but it is a little watery/runy for my liken. I shake well before each use but flies out of the bottle. Great cent, my face feels clean and moisturized. Nice later.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen King

customer_reviews.title: Great daily cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: The Purifying Charcoal Face Wash has been my daily face wash for almost six months now. It has been very effective cleaning pores and drawing out excess sebum and oils. It leaves my face in perfect condition to apply the other Brickell products both day and night! I'm a huge fan of the natural and organic ingredients. Excellent daily cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I'd be a skin care guy, but..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a skin care regimen from Brickell after using this soap and the many highly rated reviews from across the web, and my skin is noticeably different almost immediately. I start and end my day with this face wash. It's refreshing scent is a great signal to my brain that we're either starting or ending the day. A little goes a long way here and after one use you will feel the difference in cleanliness. It spreads evenly and rinses off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an organic brand of men's products for my husband. While he totally gets that bad ingredients are bad for his health, he felt a lot of organic brands were more feminine-looking in packaging and scent. I was so excited to find Brickell! The packaging and their story made me think this may FINALLY be a brand my husband would go for - I was RIGHT!!! He loved the packaging and scent of this face wash. He said he "really liked how clean" his face felt. He liked the face wash and is willing to continue to explore more of what this brand has to offer! Thanks, Brickell for making a natural men's line with organic ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherK

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after using a different companies charcoal face wash. This was is a bit more liquidy, and that concerned me at first. I thought perhaps the the ingredients were thinned out. After using awhile it turns out the consistency helps with the application and removal of the product from my face. I love the smell and it keeps my face looking clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: First, I will start off by saying that I have had extremely sensitive skin all my life. I've tried most of the "clear and free" soaps out there and have had poor results. I heard about Brickell roughly a year ago and gave their Free Sample kit a try. The following month or so after receiving the kit and selecting the products that worked for me, my skin began to clear up and my face felt refreshed. The face wash is a great product, especially for those with sensitive and dry skin. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a new face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use regular soap to wash my face but it used to dry my skin and I did not feel refreshed. After using the Brickell's face wash, I have found the perfect substitute than using soap. The face wash makes my face feel clean and refreshed and it does not give me any type of breakouts. I love the product and will definitely buy the bigger size to put in my daily regimen of taking care of my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry out my face and considering I am a senior citizen that's really good. Will continue usage
customer_reviews.text: a low foaming cleanser. In fact using on my t zone find it compacts the pares and reduces blackheads a bit. Does not dry out my face and considering I am a senior citizen that's really good. Will continue usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great natural cleanserfor Dry/Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find the right natural/organic face wash for some time. Having previously worked in the chemical industry I know exactly what harsh ingredients go into their manufacture consequently I look for natural/organic products. I found Brickell's Charcoal facewash perfectly fit the bill. My skin felt thoroughly cleansed but not dried out afterwards. I will say that I ordered Brickell's free sample kit from their website and I found the clarifying gel facewash a better fit for me. I have oily skin that tends to break out on occasion. Both products are 5 star to me you just have to know your skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: best face wash i have used
customer_reviews.text: It leaves your skin feeling fresh but not over-dried. I really like the fact it has all the benefits of charcoal. I get compliments at work all the time about how smooth my face looks. I like the fact you can just throw some in the palm of your hand and wash quickly and easy not wasting a lot of time. I will try the unscented one next time I'm not really a fan of the scented one but others might like it.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul32

customer_reviews.title: Great Facewash with Quality Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a facewash routine since I was a young teenager, and it has changed many times over the years as I've aged. Most of the time when I try a new facewash I'll use it for a few weeks and then toss it for not being a good addition to my routine. However, this charcoal facewash was an instant winner! I use it a few times a week to help keep my face clean and refreshed, on rotation with a scrub and a mild salicylic wash. Best of all, the ingredients are natural and mostly organic, and like all Brickell products cruelty free!
customer_reviews.author: Anders R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan - doesn't lather
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this. It does not lather up so I end up needing to use loads of it before my face feels clean. I normally end up washing my face twice with it as my face still feels oily after the first wash. I won't buy again. Prefer my previous face wash from Kiehls
customer_reviews.author: the penguin & owl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and costumer service. What can beat that?
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I have tried many products over the years, and I finally found what I was looking for. I use it twice a day, before and after I sleep. It gives you this tingling feeling after you wash your face. I am not sure how, but it does brighten your face up after every use. I am still excited about trying their new product, they sent me a free sample of all their products. Couldn’t ask for more. So far, everything I used is just remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Nader A. Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin worse.
customer_reviews.text: Made me skin worse. Perhaps my face isn’t used to cleansers as I never really used a face scrub before. But over the 2 months since I’ve purchase this product this cleanser has only made my skin look worse, it’s caused me to breakout which I haven’t since being a teenager. Needed to stop using and my skin and improved dramatically. The scent is nice but everything else about this product is a big miss.
customer_reviews.author: Joe.Lo

customer_reviews.title: No harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. I used several products in the past like Wadi etc but I personally recommend Brickell. This is very relishing. I apply it thrice in a week and it has been helping me a lot go through little but acne that I have on my face. It's like a face pack I apply it daily in the morning and leave it for five minutes then wash it under luke warm water. The chemical content is very less too it is worth for the money that your paying.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I typically have issue with dry skin especially in the wintertime so I have to try to find the least "drying" products I can. I have been quite happy with this charcoal face wash as it is a solid daily cleanser and does not add any dryness to my skin after use. Goes on easily and you don't need too much at all for full face coverage. Even though it is non-drying for me, it also isn't too oily and leaves no oily residue after use. So I count this as a win all around.
customer_reviews.author: TI

customer_reviews.title: J. Pierce says buy it, you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am 42 years old and have struggles with sensitive skin and acne since I was in middle school. Since switching to Brickell Men’s Purifying Charcoal Face Wash for Men, I have noticed my skin clearing up without all the harsh effects of acne treatment products. I love the way it makes my skin feel. I love the smell. I love the results. This isn’t a miracle cure. It takes time. I am into my second bottle and the results keep getting better. I recommend this to anyone who struggles with sensitive skin and/or acne.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to Brickell face wash from billy jealousy and don't regret it one bit. I have psoriasis on my cheeks and chin and exfoliates aggravate it. This face wash starts off a little grainy but then turns into a smooth, light face wash with a great citrus smell. My face feels great after and is clear and hydrated. I just bought another bottle I am happy with it. JD
customer_reviews.author: J. Dehner

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this face wash.
customer_reviews.text: In trying a lot of different products over the years, this one stands above others for its scent, the cleansing sensation you get when using it, the way it leaves the skin feeling healthy and moist, and the gentleness with which it cleans the skin. Very happy with this purchase and will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! The Purifying Charcoal Face Wash cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The Purifying Charcoal Face Wash cleans great, leaves my skin feeling very refreshed and not dry - I have sensitive skin so this is very important. The final balance is great - clean feeling, subtle scent and not dried out. I have seen other reviews about the texture - the product is a creamy liquid not a thicker cream so do not be surprised by this or put off, just realize it up front - it is too good of a product to let this one thing prevent you from adding to your routine. I have tried numerous other "luxury" face washes, but I will never use anything but this one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

product_meta.title: Brickell Men's Purifying Charcoal Face Wash for Men, Natural and Organic Daily Facial Cleanser, 8 Ounce, Scented
feature_bullets: What It Does: This men’s facial cleanser gently removes oil and bacteria from deep within the pores without irritating or drying out the skin.
Who It’s For: Men of any age with dry, sensitive, and normal type skin can use this men’s face wash. Men with oily skin should use our Clarifying Gel Face Wash.

How It Works: This refreshing, natural face wash for men is a cleanser packed with moisturizing extracts and vitamins. Charcoal gently deep-cleans your pores. The result is refreshed and hydrated skin.
Key Ingredients: Natural & Certified Organic ingredients, including activated charcoal, olive oil, jojoba oil, and aloe vera. All natural and organic.

Who We Are: Brickell creates skincare and grooming products for men using natural & certified organic ingredients. Our products are sold in over 20 countries and have appeared in GQ, Men's Health, Men's Journal, and other popular men’s magazines.
